title: Influenza vaccination post-COVID-19 expands vaccine-specific effector CD4 T-cells and Tregs under positive influence of host trained innate immunity.
abstract: SARS-CoV-2 immunity and innate immune training may influence influenza vaccine immunogenicity. We investigated this in India. Adult volunteers with hybrid SARS-CoV-2 immunity were administered Fluarix
clean_text: influenza vaccination post covid expands vaccine specific effector cd t cells and tregs under positive influence of host trained innate immunity sars cov immunity and innate immune training may influence influenza vaccine immunogenicity we investigated this in india adult volunteers with hybrid sars cov immunity were administered fluarix
